definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: overflow, arrogance, fury;—abs. ´[[ע]] Is 13:9 +; cstr. [[עֶבְרַת]] Zep 1:18 +; sf. [[עֶבְרָתִי]] Is 10:6 +, etc.; pl. [[עֲבָרוֹת]] Job 21:30; cstr. [[עַבְרוֹת]] Ps 7:7, Job 40:11; —
overflow, excess, outburst, [[זׇדוֹן]] ´[[ע]] Pr 21:24 excess of insolence;  [[עַבְרוֹת אַפְֶָּ]] Job 40:11 outbursts of thine anger.
arrogance, of Moab Is 16:6 ( + [[גַּאֲוׇה]]), [[ן]]:[[גַּא]] hence Je 48:20 (+ id. v:Je 48:29).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, Ge 49:7 (poem in J), Am 1:11 (both ‖[[אַף]]), Is 14:6, Pr 14:35, [[שֵׁבֶט עֶבְרָתוֹ]] Pr 22:8 (i. e. rod wielded by him in fury, v. also La 3:1 infr.), [[עַבְרוֹת חוֹרְרָָי]] Ps 7:7 the outbursts of fury of my foes

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of ´[[י]] Ho 5:10, Ho 13:11 (‖[[אַף]]), Hb Hab 3:8 (‖ id.), Is 9:18, La 2:2, Ps 90:9, Ps 90:11; + [[חֲרן אַף]] Is 13:9, ‖ id. v:Is 13:13, Ps 78:49 (+ [[זַעַם]]), Ps 85:4; [[אֵשׁ עֶבְרָתִי]] Ez Eze 21:31 (‖[[זַעַם]]), Eze 22:31 (‖ id.), v:Eze 22:21, Eze 38:19; [[שֵׁבֶט עֶבְרָתוֹ]] La 3:1 (cf. Pr 22:8 supr.); [[עַם עֶבְרָתִי]] Is 10:6 (i.e. obj. of my rage), cf. [[דּוֹר עֶבְרָתוֹ]] Je 7:29; ´[[יוֹם עֶבְרַת י]] Zep 1:18 day of ´[[י]]'s fury (coming judgment), so Ez Eze 7:19 (del. Co Berthol, after LXX, as gloss from Zp); so [[יוֹם עֶבְרָה]] Zep 1:15, Pr 11:4; [[יוֹם עֲבָרוֹת]] Job 21:30; cf. [[עֶבְרָה]] Pr 11:23.
